participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Reflective and somewhat discontented, but strives to find joy in small things.
participant_1.background: I need to move more, and get my beer gut under control. I am a huge fan of Jason Mraz. I had a client cancel her wedding a week before the big day. I get to make gummy worms all day long, which is a dream come true for me! I'm not happy with my job or marriage, but I'm trying to make the best of it.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and creative, with a passion for cooking and a curious spirit.
participant_2.background: I am proud of my ability to cook a variety of cuisines and my willingness to treat everyone with respect. I could brag about my ability to endure physical pain and my endless curiosity about the world. I went to Comic Con this weekend and had a blast! I have a bad habit of being dishonest. I do not like coffee.

content.text: Not much, just got back from Comic Con, it was a lot of fun!
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go to one.
You should! It's a great time to dress up as your favorite character and meet other people who are fans of the same things you are.
Yeah, I've heard that it's really fun. I'll have to start planning a trip to one soon.
I hope not! So what was your favorite part of Comic Con?
I think it was meeting all the other fans of my favorite shows and movies. It was really cool to meet people who are just as passionate about something as you are.
Yeah, I can imagine. That sounds like it was a lot of fun.
It was! I'm already looking forward to next year's convention.
Me too! I'm glad you had a good time.
